title: Everybody Loves Raymond - Season 3 - Opening Intro
author: GotPilot
comment: This is the perfect and most hilarious intro of not wanting to see your Relatives. 🤣🤣🤣
Let's all agree, this is the best intro ever!
after his mother touched his hair lol his face is so hilarious haha :0
I love this. Used to watch this before school every day as a kid!
